additional_buffs.description: Automatically opens golden treasure chests containing gold at a certain percentage (Basic 10%, 5-star 2%, 6-star 5%).
additional_buffs.name: Golden Treasure Chests

buffs.description: Even if Aladdin is at the Time Shop, this has an increased chance to get 10x gold (Basic 10%, 5-star 2%, 6-star 5%) when using human secret skills.
buffs.name: Human's Secret Skill

hidden_abilites: Even if Aladdin is at the Time Shop, this has an increased chance to get 10x gold. (Basic 10%, +2% per 5-star, +5% per 6-star) when using human secret skills.
The five lowest quests from those most recently opened is instantly cleared by human's secret skill. (Example: When the last quest is number 20, quests between 16 and 20 are cleared instantly.)
Automatically opens golden treasure chests containing gold at a certain percentage. (Basic 10%, +2% per 5-star and +5% per 6-star)
Upon first appearing, helps ally unit perform skill attacks faster.
description.skill1: Increase HP of human unit in Guild Raid (3.6%, 7.2%, 10.8%, 14.4%, 18%)
description.skill2: Increase melee dodge rate of melee unit in PvP (0.5%, 1%, 1.5%, 2%, 2.5%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Aladdin ]
